description.narrative: The project will promote commercializing and exporting agricultural produce and processed products along agro-value chains to stimulate agriculture's role in economic growth and poverty reduction in Samoa. It will provide business support services and financing to agribusinesses.

title.narrative: Reports and Recommendations of the President
Reports and Recommendations of the President
Return on equity for supported agribusinesses
